attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The care of vulnerable children has broken down at this camp. Medication and food is denied to babies. Disabled children are illegally held. Children who were healthy on arrival leave Yarl's Wood in need of medical attention. 

The standard of professional care at this prison has degraded so severely that lives are at risk. The only meaningful recourse is for Yarl's Wood Detention Center to be shut immediately.
